name: (Demo) Deathtrap Dungeon: The Interactive Video Adventure
name_original: (Demo) Deathtrap Dungeon: The Interactive Video Adventure
description:
Available for Windows, Mac, iOS and Android.

An online playable demo of a new official adaptation of the classic Fighting Fantasy Gamebook.

Reimagined as an interactive story room with Hollywood star Eddie Marsan as your dungeon master.

This is number one in a series of FMV experiences created by tiny indie team Branching Narrative.
